Weatherly is Piqo's first 3d pack that relates to weather and it's available in 3 platforms [Sketch / Adobe XD / Figma].

It's designed with Blender. We have tried to put all the weather conditions in this pack. It comes along with a source file and you can personalize icons in it.

Also, there is a clay render of all icons in this pack for minimal environments and designs. ðŸ¤˜
